column4: can anyone tell me how to get the ati DRI modules to work (not the fglrx stuff?). i can't find a decent howto for that
picking ati as your driver for x should do it
yeah, but i get no "direct rendering"
however, i find the following line my Xorg.0.log : (II) RADEON(0): Acceleration enabled
check out your xorg.conf and make sure dri on the list of modules to be loaded
so i'm wondering what i'm missing
it is. here's my xorg.conf, if you want to take a look: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/15494
i'll compare it to mine and see what the diff is
getting a bit late, uploading the xorg.conf now
pretty short, made by dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
that's all i can think of
